pageTitle: New York Yankees Nike MLB Derek Jeter #2 Commemorative Logo Hoodie (Navy)
textBeforeTable: Men's Apparel Sizes Size Chart Officially licensed by MLB Front pouch pocket Fleece lining Team colors Derek Jeter's name and number Screen printed graphics 100% Polyester Warmth will come easy as you show your team pride with this New York Yankees Derek Jeter #2 Commemorative Logo Hooded Sweatshirt from Nike. With the quality that Nike delivers you won't doubt that this will bring the spirit to every game that you go to wearing this sweatshirt. With the quality screen printed Derek Jeter Captain's badge on the front, the team colors will stand out and everyone will know who you are rooting for. Commemorate your favorite player, Derek Jeter, in comfortable and unique style at any game by sporting this New York Yankees Commemorative Logo Hooded Sweatshirt !
